overview: The Foo Fighters performance will be an epic rock 'n' roll marathon of the last great American stadium rock band. On September 28th, founder, vocalist and guitarist Dave Grohl will lead the audience in Rock City through deafening choruses of hymns that span the group's entire catalog, from their debut album, released in 1995, to more. Concrete and Gold. Massive and ambitious, Foo Fighters' shows guarantee fun. And in 2019 it will rock again!
title: Foo Fighters: Rock In Rio
